title: MTN's $2 bln Nigerian tax dispute hearing set for Jan. 30-31
text:
MTN's $2 bln Nigerian tax dispute hearing set for Jan. 30-31

Stock Markets 6 minutes ago (Oct 29, 2019 10:36)

© Reuters. MTN's $2 bln Nigerian tax dispute hearing set for Jan. 30-31 LAGOS, Oct 29 (Reuters) - A federal judge in Lagos has set Jan. 30 and 31 for the hearing of a $2 billion tax dispute between South Africa's MTN Group and the Nigerian government. The government says the telecoms firm owes $2 billion in taxes, a claim the company has said is without merit.

MTN's $2 bln Nigerian tax dispute hearing set for Jan. 30-31
description: MTN's $2 bln Nigerian tax dispute hearing set for Jan. 30-31
